alert.note: Alert for Northampton (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 16 at 8:43PM EDT until July 16 at 9:00PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 900 PM EDT FOR NORTHERN NORTHAMPTON COUNTY... At 843 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 6 miles west of Exmore to near Nassawadox to 8 miles east of Bay View, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and powerlines. These severe storms will be near... Nassawadox around 855 PM EDT. Willis Wharf around 905 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by these severe thunderstorms include Birdsnest, Machipongo, Wardtown, Franktown and Silver Beach. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
